meanings.definition: Having the most importance or influence.
meanings.sent1: The decision she made was the weightiest of all.
meanings.sent2: The professor's opinion is the weightiest in the department.
meanings.sent3: His cat's opinion on the matter seemed to be the weightiest of all.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, her words carry the weightiest influence.
meanings.sent5: The responsibility of being a parent is one of the weightiest roles in life.

meanings.definition: Most significant or substantial in terms of weight.
meanings.sent1: The elephant is the weightiest animal in the zoo.
meanings.sent2: The weightiest box was placed at the bottom of the stack.
meanings.sent3: The weightiest cake at the party was devoured in minutes.
meanings.sent4: The weightiest decision of the day was choosing what to have for lunch.
meanings.sent5: The weightiest rock in the collection was too heavy to lift.

meanings.definition: Most serious or solemn in nature.
meanings.sent1: The judge's expression was the weightiest in the courtroom.
meanings.sent2: The weightiest moment of the ceremony was when they exchanged vows.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at a serious face during the comedy show was the weightiest of all.
meanings.sent4: The weightiest topic of discussion at the meeting was the budget cuts.
meanings.sent5: The weightiest decision of his life was whether to move to a new city for work.
